snippet.title: Dungeons of Legend: Cast Within PC Trailer
snippet.description:
You play as a lone wanderer. Captured, robbed, and cast into the Abyss, you are left for dead. But below is a dungeon crafted to test the very limits of your wits and bravery. The warnings tell you to turn back, but that way is closed now. Besides, you were never one to shirk from a challenge!

Dungeons of Legend: Cast Within is a first person grid based dungeon crawling adventure. Each level of this dungeon is hand crafted to provide the most immersive and complete experience. Explore, search, gather hints, solve riddles, fight monsters, and find tons of loot and upgrades!

*************************************

Music by Evan King:
https://www.youtube.com/user/EvanKingAudio/featured
